entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
